ingredients: +   3/4 cup white sugar, 3 tablespoons cornstarch,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon,   +   1/4 teaspoon salt, 4 cups fresh blueberries, 1 (14.1 ounce) package double-crust pie pastry, thawed, 1 tablespoon butter
